alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 8:55PM CST until February 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Sawyer, Price, Burnett and Washburn Counties. In Minnesota, Pine County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle is possible at times this evening into the overnight and may add a glaze of ice to surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
